query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documentSpans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `documentId` int NOT NULL,
  `chunkId` int,
  `spanType` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `label` varchar(255),
  `startOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `endOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `matchedText` text NOT NULL,
  `context` text,
  `confidence` int,
  `metadata` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `documentSpans_documentId_idx` (`documentId`),
  KEY `documentSpans_chunkId_idx` (`chunkId`),
  KEY `documentSpans_spanType_idx` (`spanType`),
  CONSTRAINT `documentSpans_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentSpans_chunkId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`chunkId`) REFERENCES `documentChunks` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2QJxepF6RkxixEF.root --database CrKBAyYZGWJki2G2dH59p7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documentSpans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `documentId` int NOT NULL,
  `chunkId` int,
  `spanType` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `label` varchar(255),

  `matchedText` text NOT NULL,
  `context` text,

  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `documentSpans_documentId_idx` (`documentId`),
  KEY `documentSpans_chunkId_idx` (`chunkId`),
  KEY `documentSpans_spanType_idx` (`spanType`),
  CONSTRAINT `documentSpans_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentSpans_chunkId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`chunkId`) REFERENCES `documentChunks` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
